name: Grandman's Unbearable DEMO
description:
This is an early-ass demo!!

Grandman's Unbearable Existence is a physics-based platformer with heavy inspiration from momentum-platformers like Sonic and Wario Land 4, although putting more emphasis on the Super Mario World-side of level design.

Basically, you have a license to throw anything and everything, as hard as possible.
In fact, I encourage it!

The physics are your oyster! --and probably your worst enemy...
Rocket jump! Charge! and Grab! your way through 5 DEMO LEVELS, because I'm not made of time y'kno.

Oh! Did I mention?

The game's editor is up for public-use! Accessible through the title-screen!
Grandman's misery is right in your hands! Make some truly disgusting levels! Nobody'll tell you not to.

Now, please, take this demo off my hands!
Free o' charge... I'm beggin' ya!
